column4: Does ubuntu recognize most usb flash drives? If so, how do I access the new usb flash drive after I plug it in?
you mean like thumbdrives?  Yeah.  You're on gnome?  There should be an icon on your Desktop.
1GB?  Youve got plenty for a GUI
/dev/sda# is where it is.  You'll have to mount it.  lsbusb will give you info about it too.
